Hi All,

I created a parameterized test using the pattern discussed in a re=
cent 
thread.  Now that I've got that up and running, I'd like to generate =

HTML reports of the results.

methods in the class, 
the "junit" task in ant now fails.

Is there an exis=
ting workaround/solution to this?
